ygData.subject: Re: Kobold vs Elder Tier'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/28/99 10:31:40 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... And I can tell you Absolutely Positively I have Kobold in the skills list, and Elder Tier Dal
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/28/99 10:31:40 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
kalekona@... writes:

> That is simply not true.....When I look at skills there are
> DEFINATLY two different languages...one for Elder
> Tier'Dal...and one for Kobold.....and when in the chat
> window I can choose to speak either Elder Tier'Dal or
> Kobold.....

And I can tell you Absolutely Positively I have Kobold in the skills list,
and Elder Tier'Dal in the languages list.

Sonoroud

{{This thread is going nowhere but in circles. Somehow people are getting
different interfaces for EQ, must be a bug. I have confirmation from Verant
that Kobold and Elder Tier'Dal are the SAME language, and Combine and Giant
Tounge are the same language. If you see otherwise, there must be a bug.
this thread is degenerating into a circular argument so I am ending it.
There will be no more posts on this subject unless it gives new information.
- Adam}}
